item.title: Slaparoo（新規追加）
item.description: A fast-paced roguelike inspired by the classic card-game Egyptian Rat Screw. Play cards into a pile until a match appears. Then, quickly slap the pile to collect your points! Spend the money you earn from each round in the shop where you'll find a variety of powerful items to enhance your run!

A fast-paced roguelike inspired by the classic card-game Egyptian Rat Screw. Play cards into a pile until a match appears. Then, quickly slap the pile to collect your points! Spend the money you earn from each round in the shop where you'll find a variety of powerful items to enhance your run!
